page.title: 07SETTLEMENTS
page.content: {Settlements We are grateful to the{Duke of {Atholl}for allowing us to look for information in the{archives}at{Blair {Castle. The place marked on our map as {Breac Ruidh}(777668) is also known as {Woodsheal.}Donald Robertson of Woodsheal or Reinaletrick led the {Atholl Highlanders}in the{Rising}of {1745,}and as a result lost his land. We found the following settlements, which are now only heaps of stones: {Auchlany } 773670 {Craig } 777670 {Bruochrioch }777676 {Tomnasallan} 785672 In 1820 the Widow MacDonald paid a rent of Â£30 p.a. for Auchlany. Today it is part of the grazing of
